name: Traditional Blends Tea's-Eater's Digest Traditional Medicinals 16 Bag

reviews.name: Traditional Blends Tea's-Eater's Digest Traditional Medicinals 16 Bag
reviews.reviewText:
I was having problems with bloating and stomach discomfort after eating.
Since drinking the tea, I have noticed a significant difference.
I feel so much better after drinking the tea. Pleasant taste as well.
reviews.title: Excellent Tea

reviews.name: Traditional Blends Tea's-Eater's Digest Traditional Medicinals 16 Bag
reviews.reviewText: I have really bad digestive issues and am always looking for things to help. After years of drinking just peppermint tea after eating, I decided to give Eaters Digest a go. Its 10 times better then just plain peppermint. Now I drink it twice a day and don't feel restricted by what I can eat.
reviews.title: Favorite Tea.

reviews.name: Traditional Blends Tea's-Eater's Digest Traditional Medicinals 16 Bag
reviews.reviewText:
This is the ONLY product that I have found works on my upset tummy!
Now the grocery story where I purchase product is closing it out! Need to find this somewhere else.
reviews.title: Terrific product!
